Body:
"""
        Test that access denied by operation policy is processed correctly.
        """
e = engine.KmipEngine()
e.is_allowed = mock.Mock(return_value=False)
result = e._is_allowed_by_operation_policy('test_policy', ['test_user', [
    'test_group_A', 'test_group_B']], 'test_user', enums.ObjectType.
    SYMMETRIC_KEY, enums.Operation.GET)
e.is_allowed.assert_any_call('test_policy', 'test_user', 'test_group_A',
    'test_user', enums.ObjectType.SYMMETRIC_KEY, enums.Operation.GET)
e.is_allowed.assert_any_call('test_policy', 'test_user', 'test_group_B',
    'test_user', enums.ObjectType.SYMMETRIC_KEY, enums.Operation.GET)
self.assertFalse(result)
